comments:
I have opened the CVS repository view, selected "view modules" and attempted to 
expand the "HEAD" node.  The "+" disapeared after a while with the exception 
logged in .metadata\.log.  The same release worked against a different modules 
file (from a different repository).

I've seen similar behaviour prior to F2, but I did not look at the log file at 
the time as it "fixed" itself once the module file was updated.

The Excerpt from the .log file is as follows:
